metadata.description:
The Isles of Britain are the scene of bloody battles between the Warlords and Chieftains who vie for power over the territory. In the face of this merciless struggle for power, Merlin, the old wizard, will attempt to unite the disparate kingdoms against the threat of four invaders.
To do this end, he gives Uther Pnedragon a mythical sword, one that will rally all Britons and extend the will of Avalon. A legendary sword - Excalibur - that will transform the destiny of kings.
metadata.name: Excalibur - The Chronicles
